title: Lupine Brotherhood
author: VD
content_html: Space Bunny and I happened upon The Brotherhood of the Wolf recently, and despite the French with English subtitles, we both very much enjoyed it. It’s an interesting take on the dread Beast of Gevaudan. Complex without being confusing, and unpredictable even if you know a bit of the history involved. If there were more movies like this, I would go out to see more movies than Peter Jackson’s annual spectacle.
content_text:
Space Bunny and I happened upon
The Brotherhood of the Wolf
recently, and despite the French with English subtitles, we both very much enjoyed it.  It’s an interesting take on the dread
Beast of Gevaudan
.  Complex without being confusing, and unpredictable even if you know a bit of the history involved.  If there were more movies like this, I would go out to see more movies than Peter Jackson’s annual spectacle.
